The Job Order cannot be modified if it was created on a previous date other than today or if it has already been paid.

To use the app, you need to grant it the necessary permissions to enable or disable Bluetooth and access location services.

These permissions are required for the app to function properly and provide the intended features.


When you launch the app for the first time, it will prompt you to grant the necessary permissions. This includes the ability to turn on/off Bluetooth and access location services.

By granting these permissions, you allow the app to manage Bluetooth functionality and retrieve location information as required.


Please note that enabling these permissions is crucial for the app's functionality, as it relies on Bluetooth and location services to provide you with a seamless experience.

Rest assured that the app will handle these permissions responsibly and in accordance with the applicable privacy and security guidelines.
This customer has previous unpaid job orders. It is important to address this situation and ensure that the outstanding payments are resolved.
